entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Minnedosa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.2°C

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
